thread.title: Uber’s India rival starts recognising drivers with the cleanest cars
thread.title_full: Uber’s India rival starts recognising drivers with the cleanest cars - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Uber’s India rival starts recognising drivers with the cleanest cars
text: Ola, Uber’s main rival in India and the country’s dominant car-hailing app, is going to start recognising drivers who keep their cars clean based on customer feedback. It recently started categorising cars in Delhi by fuel type, allowing users to choose compressed natural gas (CNG) vehicles when hailing a ride — it’s the kind of move that could ultimately allow Ola […] »
